𐙕 𐙕

𐙕 ≈ 𐀪 ri person in 𐘀𐘬𐙕 da-du deuter teuto?

𐘴 𐝢 RA LA
𐙕 𐝥 •RI LI ⇔ λ Λ 𐊍 Letter L

𐙕 mostly looks like a wavy flag S| https://lineara.xyz/charts/

connected to Linear-A counting numbers
𐝆𐙕 : 𐝆 1/2
𐝃𐙕 : 𐝃 1/4
𐘇𐙕
𐘃𐙕

phonetic syllable in words such as

𐘇𐘳𐘚𐙕𐘮𐘱 AⁿTA-I-_-WA-JA ( hand 𐘚 𐀂 hig gib gub vs yid )
𐘱𐘳𐘚𐙕𐘉𐘱 JAⁿTA-I-_-U-JA

𐘚 = 𐀂 mostly occuring in ἱερεύς hiero "priest" ἱερός hieró- "holy" and heir "son" =>
𐘚𐘽 I-RA₂ hiera
𐘚𐙕𐘉 I•ER-U hiero
